androidprojects.projectName: Leave this aside to eliminate confusion

androidprojects.oneliner: A Credit cards based Restaurent suggestion App
androidprojects.description: Built using Ionic/Cordova framework, It Mobile App takes input from user about their credit cards, takes their location and gets all relevant places you can visit which are holding offers or redeem points against your card. This uses Foursquare API to get restaurents and their ratings, and is backed by a node API server to serve all offers against Cards

activity.head: Started a new Game development project
activity.body: Started a new multiplayer hybrid game for android/ios. Built using ionic/cordova framework. This game is backed by a node server which forms a stable message exchanger for communication between different users

activity.head: Started a new Open source Ionic project
activity.body: This is a hybrid app which can take your credit card as input can suggest all the nearby restaurents that have a offer on your card type. It uses phone's GPS location to get results based on location. Its is backed by a simple api served by a node server to serve curret deals and offers
Exodus of this awesome portfolio page.
Graduated from Indian Institute of Technology, Madras

activity.head: Completed project: Optimization of Genetic Algorithms
activity.body: I Developed a Hybrid Algorithm from Genetic and Newton-Raphson Algorithm with 10% less run-time from previous one. Not only that but also Customized algorithm to solve complex multi-variate functions with robustness and speed, developed in MATLAB
Won my first Graphic Design competition

activity.head: Completed project:  Hexapod Robot Base
activity.body: Developed a Hexapod robot base inspired from Terrestrial locomotion of Spiders Various concepts such as variable suspension, multi terrain mobility and adaptability, are successfully implemented.

activity.head: Light Drawing Robot
activity.body: We were the First Indian student team to create light photography using Robots. Developed an Omni-wheeled Holonomic robot that can instantaneously move in any direction by velocity vectoring.
